channel.title: How to watch Tv for free
channel.description:
Do you want to see Tv, but does not have any?
On this Site: http://www.freeetv.com (Its have lots of channels.)
Or can register and then download a program [url=http://zattoo.com]Here[/url] that provide you with the channels:
Al Jazeera English. Deutsche France 24 English. Lux tv (Think it is from Luxembourg) NRK1 and NRK2[size=1pt]The best channels[/size] (Norwegian) If you want to see some programs in better quality look here: http://www1.nrk.no/nett-tv The Poker sumo.tv TVP (Polish).
There will come more channels, and I have tested them all, they work.
Thank you to the Forum on Itavisen.no for the Tips.
